resources.string:
This project is a reference to the game Hypnospace Outlaw. It implements an algorithm to obfuscate text in an Android app. The Algorithm was originally implemented by Twilight Sparkle (@yourcompanionAI) on https://synthetic.garden/3y3.htm.

The algorithm maps codepoints from U+0001 to U+007E to codepoints from U+E0001 to U+E007E in order obfuscate them. They appear as zero width characters and can be hidden between normal text.

You can find the Project on Github at https://github.com/ArcticNarwhal/3y3Transcode.
